EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Framework 4 on Java 8 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Webinars: Spring Framework 4 on Java 8
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Framework 4 on Java 8 with speaker Juergen Hoeller. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, March 25, 2014 Europe: 2:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=662542716> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 662 542 716
Thank you,
